sys_properties.choices: global=Virtual Attachments are enabled on all forms table=Virtual Attachments are only activated on the tables configured by the property x_376096_va.virtual_attachments.tables script=Virtual Attachments are only activated on records that the property x_376096_va.virtual_attachments.script returns true on formatter=Virtual Attachments are only activated on forms that have included the 'Virtual Attachments' on the form (via Configure > Form Layout)
sys_properties.name: x_376096_va.virtual_attachments.mode
